sn1.12:1.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.12:2.2: Your cattle also bring you delight!
sn1.12:2.3: For attachments are a man’s delight;
sn1.12:3.2: Your cattle also bring you sorrow.
sn1.12:3.3: For attachments are a man’s sorrow;
sn1.12:3.4: without attachments there are no sorrows.”
